app_descript:
App Name: CBS Sports: Watch Live
Package Name: com.handmark.sportscaster.androidtv

Brief:

The CBS Sports App serves as the ultimate hub for sports fanatics, providing round-the-clock access to a diverse range of sports content across networks including CBS, CBS Sports Network, and Paramount+. Catering to a variety of sports tastes, this app offers live streaming for premiere events like NFL games, the UEFA Champions League, as well as collegiate-level SEC & Big Ten Football, prestigious golf tournaments, and women's professional soccer.

  • üé• Paramount+ Integration: Enjoy an expansive sports library from the Paramount+ network. üçø

  • üíµ The CBS Sports App is free to download, offering in-app purchases and access to live streams that might require a subscription to Paramount+ or cable provider authentication. üí≥

Community:

As an app centered around live sports streaming, the CBS Sports community might not be structured like a gaming app community. However, you can engage with them on several social media platforms:

  • Official Site
  • YouTube Channel
  • Follow along for updates and analysis on platforms such as Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, and more.

Please note: Due to the app's nature, active community platforms specific to the CBS Sports app such as Discord, TikTok, Reddit, and Fandom Wikis may not be prevalent or available.
